title: Man on the Train 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC BRENYS

A mysterious criminal arrives in a small town planning to rob the local bank, assuming that all will be well. But when he encounters a retired poetry professor, his plans take an unlikely turn. Through an unexpected friendship, the two realize they had the opportunity to review their own lives, full of daring hopes and unfulfilled dreams. At the same time, both have a momentary chance to explore the path not chosen.
